TestDescription.name: MySQL database dump
TestDescription.Description: A database dump contains a record of the table structure and/or the data from a database and is usually in the form of a list of SQL statements. A database dump is most often used for backing up a database so that its contents can be restored in the event of data loss. [break]This file contains a MySQL database dump. This information is highly sensitive and should not be found on a production system.
TestDescription.Impact: This file may disclose sensitive information. This information can be used to launch further attacks.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Restrict access to this file or remove it from the system.
